divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving into work around 8:30 at night... and I saw a very bright star in the Southwestern sky. I thought it might have been venus, then I noticed it was moving very slowly, and low ( lower than an airplane)and below the cloud deck towards the city. I initally thought it was an airplane, but i have never noticed one so bright, large and moving so slowly. I could never see what the object was completly because it was so bright.. all i could see was the light. I jokingly called my bf and told him I looking at a UFO... and then today I read an article that people in stephenville Texas have been noticing the same thing lately. I thought this could be in connection somehow. I lost sight of the object because i got to work and went inside.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Lubbock
There were no other sightings in Lubbock on or around January 4th 2008
Summary: Slow moving, large bright looking star
